title: 2017《哈 臺南》第十二集：HOT英語教室 │《Hot Tainan》EP12. Hot English Classroom

json.text: Hello, I’m Ivan. 哈囉，我是Ivan .
Hello, I’m Harold. 哈囉，我是Harold.
Welcome to Hot English Classroom. 歡迎來到哈英語教室
Harold, do you like working out? Harold，你喜歡健身嗎？
Of course I do. I go to the gym on a regular basis. 當然囉！我固定會上健身房
Then have you ever gone to an open air gym? 那你有去過露天的健身房嗎？
An open air gym? Do you mean a park? 露天？你是指公園嗎？
No. I am talking about a forestry center with a lot of hiking paths. 不是，是有許多登山步道的林場
Oh! No, I haven’t. I live in the city far away from the mountains. 喔！很少，我住在市區，距離山區很遠
It’s not far away from the city! 不會喔！
The National Sinhua Forest in Sinhua is only about a 30 or 40 minute drive from downtown Tainan. 新化林場離市中心大約三、四十分的車程，不會太遠
Wow! So there is a place like that in Tainan? 哇！臺南有這種地方喔
Yep! People who like hiking often go to the National Sinhua Forest for a nice hike 對啊，喜歡登山健行的朋友，平常都會去新化林場爬山，
and then have a cup of “Mountain Forest Coffee” there. 然後喝杯山林咖啡
Wow! It must be sounds good!  哇！那一定很美味！
It is. You can also trek around the local aboriginal villages. 沒錯，還可以去附近的部落走走
Are there any other places you would recommend going to in Xinhua? 那新化還有什麼推薦的地方嗎？
The Old Street of Sinhua is an attraction that you just have to hang out at. 新化老街是必逛的景點，
There are many memorial halls,  那裡有許多的紀念館、
restaurants renovated from Japanese colonial architecture and museums there.  日式歷史建築修復再利用的餐廳或者文物館，
They are all really worth visiting and appreciating. 都很值得欣賞
It sounds like there is a lot of hidden culture there. 聽起來有許多不同文化都藏在那裡
That’s right. 沒錯！
Even the agriculture there is managed very creatively.  連農業也都經營得非常有創意，
The packaging of the farm products is very unique. 農產品也包裝得非常有特色，
It is a favorite among young art enthusiasts. 是文青的最愛
Wow! There is even so much attention given to common cultural items.  哇！連生活文化都這麼講究！
It sure is. 沒錯！
Alright! So on my next vacation I have a new spot to tour around. 哇！這個假期我又有新的旅遊景點了！
That’s great!I hope you enjoy your next vacation very much. 太棒了！好好享受你的假期
Let’s review the new words for today. 讓我們一起複習今天的單字
Let’s review! 一起來複習吧！
Sinhua 新化
work out 健身
regularly 固定
open air 露天
hiking 登山
forestry center 林場
mountains 山區
agriculture 農業
Did you get all that? 都記起來了嗎？
I got it! 我都記起來了
See you next time on Hot English Classroom. 英語小教室，下次見囉！
